description: Detects suspicious execution of "PDQDeployRunner" which is part of the PDQDeploy service stack that is responsible for executing commands and packages on a remote machines
false_positives: Legitimate use of the PDQDeploy tool to execute these commands
name: Suspicious Execution Of PDQDeployRunner
query: (process.parent.executable:*PDQDeployRunner\-* AND (process.executable:(*\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\wmic.exe OR *\\msiexec.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\csc.exe OR *\\dllhost.exe OR *\\certutil.exe OR *\\scriptrunner.exe OR *\\bash.exe OR *\\wsl.exe) OR process.executable:(*C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *C\:\\ProgramData\\* OR *C\:\\Windows\\TEMP\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp*) OR process.command_line:(*iex\ * OR *Invoke\-* OR *DownloadString* OR *http* OR *\ \-enc\ * OR *\ \-encodedcommand\ * OR *FromBase64String* OR *\ \-decode\ * OR *\ \-w\ hidden*)))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
